message.entry: Unable to detect sufficient number of feature points for successful chart import. Check if image is valid and consider increasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Unable to detect registration point 1 (top left). Check if image is valid and consider increasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Unable to detect registration point 2 (top right). Check if image is valid and consider increasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Unable to detect registration point 3 (bottom right). Check if image is valid and consider increasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Unable to detect registration point 4 (bottom left). Check if image is valid and consider increasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Registration points may not be correctly aligned. Check if image is valid and consider decreasing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Detected alignment points may not be correct. Check if image is valid and consider changing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Detected gray patches may not be correct. Check if image is valid and consider changing detection sensitivity in case no registration points are provided.
Unable to detect chart due to invalid registration points.
Valid options are 'horizontal', 'vertical' or 'both'.
Registration points outside image bounds.
No valid edge ROIs specified.
{0} is not a RGB image.
Dimensions of {0} are not large enough for successful chart import.
Parent is not a valid axis handle.
Sharpness measurement may not be accurate as ROI contrast is less than 20%.
Sharpness measurement may not be accurate as slope of slanted edge deviates significantly from 5 degrees.
Sharpness measurement table. The rows of the sharpnessTable correspond to individual slanted edge ROIs numbered as displayed when using the displayChart function.
Index of an ROI.
Measured angle in degrees between the slanted edge and the horizontal or vertical depending on the orientation of the edge.

A flag which is true when sharpness measurement is reliable. It is false when the sharpness measurement is not reliable due to the following conditions, (i) the slopeAngle is less than 3.5 or more than 15 degrees or (ii) the contrast within the ROI is less than 20%.
Table containing SFR measurements for R,G,B and Y edge profiles.
In case confidenceFlag is false, outlines the reason for unreliable sharpness measurement.
Average sharpness measurement table.
Direction of ROI Orientation.
Frequencies for R, G, B and Y at which frequency response is {0}%.
Frequencies for R, G, B and Y at which frequency response is {0}% of peak frequency response.
Chromatic aberration measurement table. The rows of the aberrationTable correspond to individual slanted edge ROIs numbered as displayed when using the displayChart function.
Chromatic aberration measured as the area between the maximum and the minimum R,G and B edge profiles.
Aberration expressed as a percentage of the distance between the center of the image and the center of the ROI.
R,G,B and Y edge profiles averaged along the slanted edge.
edgeProfiles normalized between [0,1] using 5% of the front end and tail end data.
Color measurement table. The rows of the colorTable correspond to individual color ROIs sequentially numbered as displayed when using the displayChart function.
Mean of R channel pixels in a ROI.
Mean of G channel pixels in a ROI.
Mean of B channel pixels in a ROI.
Reference L values.
Reference a values.
Reference b values.
Euclidean color distance between measured and reference color values as outlined in CIE76.
Noise measurement table. The rows of the noiseTable correspond to individual gray ROIs sequentially numbered as displayed when using the displayChart function.
Mean of R channel pixels in a ROI
Mean of G channel pixels in a ROI
Mean of B channel pixels in a ROI
Root mean square (RMS) noise of R pixels
Root mean square (RMS) noise of G pixels
Root mean square (RMS) noise of B pixels
RMS noise of R expressed as a percentage of the maximum of the original chart image datatype
RMS noise of G expressed as a percentage of the maximum of the original chart image datatype
RMS noise of B expressed as a percentage of the maximum of the original chart image datatype
Ratio of signal to noise in R
Ratio of signal to noise in G
Ratio of signal to noise in B
Signal to noise ratio in dB (20*log(Signal/Noise)) for R
Signal to noise ratio in dB (20*log(Signal/Noise)) for G
Signal to noise ratio in dB (20*log(Signal/Noise)) for B
Peak signal to noise ratio in dB for R
Peak signal to noise ratio in dB for G
Peak signal to noise ratio in dB for B
RMS noise for Y channel in YCbCr color space
RMS noise for Cb channel in YCbCr color space
RMS noise for Cr channel in YCbCr color space
eSFR test chart
Support for distorted charts requires Computer Vision Toolbox.
Unable to detect chart style automatically. Please specify chart style as argument.
Grayscale chart detected. Color metrics may not be useful.
Invalid input arguments. Only one argument among RegistrationPoints and Sensitivity can be provided.
